segments.text: Excuse me , I wonder if you could help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I hate to have to say this , but I'm not happy with my room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , the traffic is very loud . I got no sleep last night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm so sorry , Sir . I'll see what I can do about that .
segments.speaker: S2
